bin.nano:
#!/bin/bash
echo 'Nice try! Real nano is in /usr/bin'

etc.motd:
Welcome to CTF-OS!
May the flags be with you...
etc.issue:
CTF-OS 1.0 \n \l

Warning: System may contain easter eggs
etc.sudoers:
# Security notice:
# You're not in the sudoers file... but nice try!

.ssh.id_rsa:
-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
FAKE_KEY_DONT_TRY_THIS
-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----

user.todo.txt:
[ ] Take over world
[ ] Find all flags
[ ] Drink coffee
user.poem.txt:
Roses are red
Violets are blue
Unexpected '}' on line 32

.secret_diary.entry1.txt:
Dear diary,
Today I found a flag but forgot to commit it...

log.system.log:
INFO: System operational
DEBUG: 42 anomalies detected
log.security.log:
WARNING: Multiple sudo attempts
NOTICE: User tried to 'rm -rf /'

games.fortune:
#!/bin/bash
echo 'You will find a hidden flag today!'

tmp.warning.txt:
DANGER ZONE!
Files here self-destruct every 10 seconds!

emergency_kit.README:
In case of emergency:
1) Panic
2) ??
3) Profit

.hidden.riddle.txt:
What has keys but can't open locks?

Answer: Piano (and this filesystem!)

area51.alien.txt: üëΩ We come in peace (but take your flags)
